actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide for grants to assist States and communities in developing a comprehensive approach to helping children 5 and under who have been exposed to domestic violence or a violent act in the home or community.
short_title: Safe From the Start Act of 2001

summary.text: Safe From the Start Act of 2001 - Amends the Violence Against Women Act 2000 to direct the Attorney General to award grants to eligible State entities that shall award grants to community coalitions throughout the State to design and implement a comprehensive and coordinated approach to identify, respond to, and serve young children who have been witnesses to or victims of violence.

titles.title: Safe From the Start Act of 2001

A bill to provide for grants to assist States and communities in developing a comprehensive approach to helping children 5 and under who have been exposed to domestic violence or a violent act in the home or community.
